title: Sampler, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: tent, cross and satin stitches on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Varying scenes: a house with animals; designs of plants, flowers, birds, a windmill, and animals. Verse on friendship. Bordered by carnations.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Medium: silk embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: tent, cross and satin stitches on plain weave. Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe. 1941-69-158.
